alert.note: Alert for Morgan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 22 at 8:13PM MDT until June 26 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River at Fort Morgan affecting Morgan County zone. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...South Platte River at Fort Morgan. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, There is minor flooding of agricultural land along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
